body_html: @pietern How do you want to expose timeout eventually to the front-end API, we should document this better since now only Gloo supports timeout, the other twos do not. Maybe adding a comment somewhere making this a TODO for other two backends.
body_text: @pietern How do you want to expose timeout eventually to the front-end API, we should document this better since now only Gloo supports timeout, the other twos do not. Maybe adding a comment somewhere making this a TODO for other two backends.
